content.description: There is a bulge between the second and third bolts that is balancy to pull.   Other than that, it is a pleasing jug haul.
content.location: Third climb from the right on the tall part of Boulevard wall.
Fourth route from the right on the tall part of the wall that faces the trail. Just to the left of   Ward Off

content.description: There are two cruxes. The first is a small roof about 15 feet up. Actually the hard part is clipping the bolt above this. Next about 2/3's of the way up there is blank spot, that if you want you can avoid by climbing to one side of it.    Its not as sustained, or fun as Ward Off.   It does however have a plentiful supply of loose things that can fall on your belayer.
content.location: Second climb from the right on Boulevard wall, just to the left of   Go Left.

content.description: This climb really has no redeeming value.  It goes into a dirty chimney with lots of loose rocks for a few feet before it tops out at the anchors for Drillin' Hoes.  If you decide to do it, count to ten and think about it some more. Eventually, the urge will pass.
content.location: Starts at the left end of the right hand part of Boulevard wall and ends on the right hand side of the left part of Boulevard wall.

content.description:
Chossy for the first 50 feet with a minicrux about 25 feet up.  The chossy minicrux can be avoided...   by going left ( a couple feet ) to solid rock with a couple of hard to spot bomber holds. 

  The fun starts for the last 10 feet where it is overhanging and juggy.
content.location: This is the furthest right climb on Boulevard wall.   Boulevard wall is further up the trail from the spearhead area. It is a pretty tall wall with some staining on it.
To the left of the main part of Boulevard wall, at right angles, there are three really hard climbs.   This is the middle one.

content.description: Starts on a horizontal roof to steep pockets.
content.location: This is the leftmost route on the left hand side of Boulevard wall.
Rightmost route on the left part of Boulevard wall.   Shares anchors with that horrible chimney route.

content.description: North facing wall with some harder climbs.
